text:
Jean-François Ott (born 1965) is a serial entrepreneur and the founder of ORCO a Luxembourg real estate investment company. He is the current chairman of Ott Partners Limited.
Education and career.
He completed his graduation in Finance and Economics from the Grenoble Institute of Political Studies in 1985, and also studied the INSEAD Owners Directors Program.
In 1987, Before starting a career as a derivatives trader in Paris, he worked for the French group Framatome in South Korea, and, then in 1991, he founded ORCO a real estate development company based in Luxembourg. In 2014, he stepped down as the CEO. Jean-François is also the chairman of Ott Properties Safetic Construction, LOP Urban logistic and Ott Ventures and Fonciere Paris Nord.
